name: LG2: Terry The Tapeworm
description:
LG2, a Snakelike clone actually more inspired by a flashgame many years ago. it doesn't really play like snake though.

A and D keys move around, dodge the medicine pills, they kill you.

Q returns to main menu, R resets for when you die

Don't bite yourself

As terry eats the corn, he grows, and he goes faster and turns sharper. my highest score is 66.  the movement isn't really like snake, but i achieved what i wanted to really. I could have made more levels but the gameplay isn't really engaging enough to bother.
